content: Stepped drill bit TS-BT 31-74 PFP ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Inserts- - ### FEATURES:Features Decoater efficiently removes passive fire protection (PFP) coatings Step drill bit helps ensure correct hole depth Engineered to drill faster and last longer Simplifies the task of drilling pilot holes to the correct depth on PFP coated beams Applications Removing PFP coatings when fastening S-BT threaded studs on PFP coated steel beams with TS-BT 31-74 PFP Removing PFP coatings when fastening X-BT threaded studs on PFP coated steel beams with TX-BT 31-74 PFP Multi-purpose fastening of S-BT or X-BT on PFP coated beams ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Steel Hole diameter: 31 mm Technical Data | Base materials | Steel | Hole diameter | 31 mm ### ITEMS- 2270470 - Stepped drill bit TS-BT 31-74 PFP - Package Size 1 pc
